description: Number of graceful permutations of length n.
references: N. J. A. Sloane and Simon Plouffe, The Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences, Academic Press, 1995 (includes this sequence).

H. S. Wilf and N. Yoshimura, Ranking rooted trees and a graceful application, in Discrete Algorithms and Complexity (Proceedings of the Japan-US joint seminar, 1986, Kyoto, Japan), edited by D. Johnson, T. Nishizeki, A. Nozaki and H. S. Wilf, Academic Press, NY, 1987, pp. 341-350.

J. Wodlinger, COSTAS ARRAYS, GOLOMB RULERS AND WAVELENGTH ISOLATION SEQUENCE PAIRS, M.S. Dissertation, Math. Dept., Simon Fraser University, Spring 2012; http://people.math.sfu.ca/~jed/Papers/Jane%20Wodlinger.%20Master's%20Thesis.%202012.pdf.-From _N. J. A. Sloane_, Oct 15 2012
links: Michal Adamaszek (aszek(AT)mimuw.edu.pl), Aug 22 2006, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..40
M. Adamaszek, Efficient enumeration of graceful permutations
Eric Weisstein's World of Mathematics, Graceful Permutation
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
extensions: n=2 term corrected 6/96. a(11)-a(20) from Robert Aldred and _Brendan McKay_.
More terms from Michal Adamaszek (aszek(AT)mimuw.edu.pl), Aug 22 2006
